actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 98 of title 28 of the United States Code to authorize the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana to be held at Houma.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana to be held at Houma. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 98)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 98 of title 28 of the United States Code to authorize the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana to be held at Houma.
